articles.title: Second actor accuses Tyler Perry of sexual assault in new lawsuit - CBS News
articles.description: It marks the second lawsuit in recent months accusing the filmmaker and studio mogul of leveraging his power in Hollywood to make sexual advances.

articles.title: Queen Elizabeth II's most iconic outfits ahead of royal exhibit - BBC
articles.description: From fashion diplomacy in the US to a transparent raincoat, the late Queen's style was a powerful formula.

articles.title: Man accused of 1996 Tupac Shakur killing seeks to suppress evidence - ABC News

articles.title: Oasis saved! – Popular nightclub receives emergency donation; will close for only a few months - Bay Area Reporter
articles.description: After announcing in July that SoMa nightclub Oasis would permanently close after New Year’s Eve, a surprise emergency donation made last week could possibly save the nightclub, which will now only temporarily close for a few months.

articles.title: ‘The Lion King’ Broadway actress stabbed to death at the age of 25 - MassLive.com
articles.description: A Broadway actress has died after being found with multiple stab wounds and her boyfriend has been arrested.

articles.title: Zack Snyder Posts Henry Cavill’s Superman Test Photos In The “Original” Suit - Deadline

articles.title: Today's Wordle Hints, Answer and Help for Dec. 27, #1,652 - CNET

articles.title: Did Nicki Minaj Lose 10 Million Instagram Followers? - Forbes
articles.description: Minaj appears to have deactivated her Instagram account in October, months before her Turning Point USA appearance.

articles.title: MAGA Goes Nuts After King Charles Claims ‘Diversity Is Our Strength’ In Christmas Speech - Yahoo
articles.description: King Charles III enraged British conservatives and some MAGA adherents with his annual Christmas message, where he praised the nation's "diversity."

articles.description: There’s a flashback scene in Josh Safdie and Timothée Chalamet’s new movie, ‘Marty Supreme,’ that unlocks the whole movie. Let’s break down what it means.

articles.title: The Best Movies of 2025 Have One Thing in Common - Slate
articles.description: These films and documentaries speak to our current political moment.
